passages.name: Time15
passages.text:
"What I'd give," Lauchlan says, "for a bite..."

Your own gut is eating itself, 
acids [[churning|hub2]] their protest.

passages.name: do it
passages.text: You impale the cat and <<if $time lte 4>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 5>>[[roast|Time1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 6>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 7>>[[roast|Time2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 8>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 9>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 10>>[[roast|Time3]]<<endif>><<if $time is 11>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 12>>[[roast|Time4]]<<endif>><<if $time is 13>>[[roast|Time5]]<<endif>><<if $time is 14>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 15>>[[roast|Time6]]<<endif>><<if $time is 16>>[[roast|Time7]]<<endif>><<if $time is 17>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 18>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 19>>[[roast|Time8]]<<endif>><<if $time is 20>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 21>>[[roast|Time9]]<<endif>><<if $time is 22>>[[roast|Time10]]<<endif>><<if $time is 23>>[[roast|Time11]]<<endif>><<if $time is 24>>[[roast|Time12]]<<endif>><<if $time is 25>>[[roast|Time13]]<<endif>><<if $time is 26>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 27>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 28>>[[roast|Time14]]<<endif>><<if $time is 29>>[[roast|Time15]]<<endif>><<if $time is 30>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 31>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 32>>[[roast|Time16]]<<endif>><<if $time is 33>>[[roast|Time17]]<<endif>><<if $time is 34>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 35>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 36>>[[roast|Time18]]<<endif>><<if $time is 37>>[[roast|Time19]]<<endif>><<if $time is 38>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 39>>[[roast|Time20]]<<endif>><<if $time is 40>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 41>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 42>>[[roast|Time21]]<<endif>><<if $time is 43>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 44>>[[roast|Time22]]<<endif>><<if $time is 45>>[[roast|Time23]]<<endif>><<if $time is 46>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 47>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 48>>[[roast|Time24]]<<endif>><<if $time is 49>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 50>>[[roast|Time25]]<<endif>><<if $time is 51>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 52>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 53>>[[roast|Time26]]<<endif>><<if $time is 54>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 55>>[[roast|Time23]]<<endif>><<if $time is 56>>[[roast|hub2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 57>>[[roast|Time27]]<<endif>> it\non the spit over the flames.<<set $fire to $fire +1>><<set $time to $time +1>><<set $crank to 0>><<set $hub to 0>><<set $death to random(2)>><<if $death is 0>><<playsound "Cat_Death.mp3">><<endif>><<if $death is 1>><<playsound "Cat_Death2.mp3">><<endif>><<if $death is 2>><<playsound "Cat_Death3.mp3">><<endif>>

passages.name: hitch
passages.text: "What's the hitch?" asks Lauchlan.\n"Never mind. I'll go ahead."<<timedgoto "lauchskewer" 3s>>

passages.name: Time10
passages.text:
Above you in the darkness you can feel it 
looking down, and then you see the shadows
slink across the floor. Something smaller
than a dog but [[larger|Time101]] than a rat.

passages.name: cold
passages.text: Every person will learn soon enough.<<timedgoto "ending" 5s>>

passages.name: wood
passages.text: You cast more wood [[into the pit|hub4]].<<set $fire to 0>><<playsound "Fire_Rush.mp3">>

passages.name: first sack
passages.text: You will take turns but the first sack\ngoes to you. Lauchlan [[watches|cat]] as you\nunfasten its mouth to reach inside.<<set $fire to 0>>

passages.name: combo
StoryTitle
passages.text: Taghairm

passages.name: Sound
Time27
passages.text: Timbers buckle. A storm rumbles.\nSparks fly into the rafters and eyes \nin the millions [[gleam|Time271]] down onto you.<<loopsound "Storm.mp3">>

passages.name: wood1
passages.text: You cast more wood [[into the pit|hub3]].<<set $fire to 0>><<playsound "Fire_Rush.mp3">>\n

passages.name: Time25
passages.text: It begins with first one cat, then another.\nIt must have something to do with the hour.\nThey are howling. A chorus. [[Lamentation.|Time251]]<<set $watch to 5>><<loopsound "Caterwaul.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "Hiss.mp3">>

passages.name: Time24
passages.text:
Your cousin's face is masked with ash,
his hands and arms blistered. He chokes
with smoke whenever he inhales.

Nothing but [[pain|cat]].

passages.name: Time23
passages.text: Anathemas. Abominations. Murderers.<<timedgoto "hub1" 2s>>

passages.name: Time22
passages.text:
Their clowders crowd the rafters,
eyes alive with firelight, 
amassed and sliding. Beasts. Demons.

There are [[hundreds|cat]].

passages.name: Time21
passages.text:
Their voices whisper to you in hisses.

Anathemas. Abominations. Murderers.

You [[don't listen|Time212]].<<set $watch to 4>><<loopsound "Hiss.mp3">>

passages.name: Time20
passages.text: Still more arrive. They are waiting\nin the shadows and the smoke,\njust like the [[cats|Time201]] you've been spitting.<<set $clowder to 1>>

passages.name: ending
passages.text:
@@color:grey;font-size:2em;[[Taghairm|definition]]@@<<if $credits is 1>>
Chandler Groover

[[Sound Credits|sounds]]
[[About]]<<endif>>

passages.name: morning
passages.text: Now that the morning's arrived\nshe glances sideways from the bed\nand says nothing.<<timedgoto "nothing" 5s>>

passages.name: roast
passages.text:
<<set $quickly to 1>>Not quickly.

Otherwise you
wouldn't have [[enough|hub2]].

passages.name: release
passages.text: You hesitate.<<timedgoto "hitch" 2s>><<set $fire to $fire +1>><<set $release to 1>>

passages.name: skewer
passages.text:
Next you lift a skewer.

You could <<if $quickly is 0>>[[do it|doit]]<<endif>><<if $quickly is 1>>[[do it]]<<endif>>
or <<if $release is 0>>[[release]]<<endif>><<if $release is 1>>[[release|release2]]<<endif>><<if $release is 2>>[[release|release3]]<<endif>> the cat.

passages.name: Time8
passages.text: More scurrying. More mice.\nAnd nothing to [[catch|hub1]] them.

passages.name: Time9
passages.text:
As your second night deepens you hear
something moving again, but not a mouse.
It's in the rafters.

"What's that?" Lauchlan asks.

You [[couldn't say|hub1]] if you wanted.

passages.name: fence
passages.text:
Lauchlan's there, leaning onto the stone wall.

"Doesn't look like you've slept much," he says.

You could reply the [[same]].

passages.name: Time4
passages.text:
"Devilish grueling, this," Lauchlan says.
You can see that his own eyes are red
from the smoke, from no sleep.

More hours [[pass|hub1]].

passages.name: Time5
passages.text:
You catch yourself drifting and
jolt back to attention.

Another [[sack|cat]], quickly.

passages.name: Time6
passages.text:
Lauchlan looks grim. It must've been
one day by now. Longer. He ought to
have slept more before this started.

He ought to have eaten more.

You ought to have eaten more [[too|hub1]].

passages.name: Time7
passages.text:
Your hunger gnaws. Even these 
roasted cats smell inviting.

"What I'd give for a [[bite|cat]]," Lauchlan says.

passages.name: Time1
passages.text: As the hours pass, you toss the roasted\ncats into a heap. Their blackened flesh\n[[smokes|cat]] even removed from the flames.

passages.name: Time2
passages.text: Something scuttles in the barn.\n\nA mouse [[perhaps|cat]].

passages.name: Time3
passages.text:
More hours pass. It must be afternoon
or early night outside, but in the barn
there's only smoke and firelight.

Both your eyes [[sting|cat]].

passages.name: Time213
passages.text: You [[shut your ears|cat]].

passages.name: yes
passages.text: Yes, yes, you say. [[Yes.|master]]

passages.name: barn
passages.text:
It's empty before the harvest. Overhead the rafters 
are shadows. A space has been cleared and a <<if $fire lte 1>>fire<<endif>><<if $fire is 2>>[[fire]]<<endif>> 
kindled in a freshly excavated pit.

There are <<if $cords is 0>>[[cords]]<<endif>><<if $cords is 1>>cords<<endif>> stacked nearby.
<<if $sacks is 0>>[[Sacks]]<<endif>><<if $sacks is 1>>Sacks<<endif>> are piled against the walls.<<loopsound "Fire_Pit.mp3">><<set $crank to 0>><<set $hub to 0>>

passages.name: hitch2
passages.text: "Why the delay?" asks Lauchlan.\n"Need to keep them burning. Here."<<timedgoto "lauchskewer" 5s>>

passages.name: hitch3
passages.text: You drop the cat.<<timedgoto "hitch4" 2s>>

passages.name: hitch4
passages.text: "What've you done?" Lauchlan cries.\nToo late he thinks to grab another sack.<<timedgoto "hitch5" 4s>>

passages.name: hitch5
passages.text: The cat roasting above the fire dies\nand in that moment something in the barn\nseems to have <<if $clowder is 0>>[[gone]]<<endif>><<if $clowder is 1>>[[gone|gone1]]<<endif>>.<<fadeoutsound "Caterwaul.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "Hiss.mp3">>

passages.name: waiting
passages.text: You [[leave|waiting3]] the barn.

passages.name: Time271
passages.text: Master, they say. Master. Master.<<timedgoto "Time272" 3s>>

passages.name: Time273
passages.text:
<<playsound "Smash.mp3">>A crack and the doors burst apart.

Winds rush in to extinguish the fire.

Everything blinks out like a candle.<<timedgoto "candle" 7s>><<fadeoutsound "Fire_Pit.mp3">>

passages.name: Time272
passages.text: Master.<<timedgoto "Time273" 3s>>

passages.name: Time161
passages.text: Again.\n\n[[Snap|cat]] your head back.

passages.name: Untitled Script 1 1 1
Time212
passages.text: Anathemas. Abominations. Murderers.<<timedgoto "Time213" 2s>>

passages.name: loose
passages.text:
"Well," your cousin says, "unnatural transactions 
never turn out tidy-like. Somehow I think I'm glad. 
Can't imagine how we got along that road."

What you don't say is that [[you can]].

passages.name: Time101
passages.text: Sitting beyond the firelight.\n\n[[Watching.|hub2]]<<set $watch to 1>>

passages.name: same
passages.text: You've already discussed what happens next.\n\nThe barn stands open. You [[enter|barn]].

passages.name: smoldering
passages.text: Lauchlan collapses to his knees.\n\nYou do the [[same|bigears]].

passages.name: dwindling
passages.text: You should have listened to her \nfrom the start.<<timedgoto "gone2" 4s>>

passages.name: definition
passages.text:
[[Taghairm|ending]] (togherim). //Perhaps the most horrible of all recorded magical spells. It consisted of roasting a series of cats on spits until, in the end, a gigantic cat appeared and granted the wishes of the operants. The last known performance of this rite was at the beginning of the 17th century, and it was recorded in the //London Literary Gazette (March 1824)//. It was quoted by Donald A. Mackenzie in //Scottish Folklore and Folk-life//. The operants were Allan MacLean and Lauchlan MacLean, each of whom wished to secure a boon. They continued the operation for four days without tasting food. The barn became full of demon black cats yelling, and at length the master cat, Big Ears, appeared and granted them their wishes, though it was said they would never look on the face of God, and indeed it seems unlikely that they would.//

--Katharine Briggs, //An Encyclopedia of Fairies

<>

passages.name: lauchwood
passages.text: Lauchlan casts more wood <<if $hub is 2>>[[into the pit|hub3]]<<endif>><<if $hub is 1>>[[into the pit|hub4]]<<endif>>.<<set $fire to 0>><<playsound "Fire_Rush.mp3">>

passages.name: timer
turn
passages.text: <<set $crank to 1>>You crank the handle and the spit\npresents a <<if $hub is 1>>[[new flank|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $hub is 2>>[[new flank|hub2]]<<endif>> to the fire.<<playsound "Splatter.mp3">>

passages.name: Advance.
passages.text: She began against it.<<timedgoto "coward" 3s>>

passages.name: Time172
passages.text: You [[drive|Time173]] a skewer into your own leg \nto keep awake.<<playsound "Stab.mp3">>

passages.name: StoryAuthor
passages.text: Chandler Groover

passages.name: Time171
passages.text: No more drifting.<<timedgoto "Time172" 2s>>

passages.name: nostopping
passages.text: "There's no stopping," says Lauchlan.\n"Won't you fetch [[another|cat]]?"

passages.name: Time201
passages.text:
"Then you see them too," Lauchlan says.

They continue to gather, stepping from hidden
regions. In your [[delirium|cat]] you cannot tell a
fever from the truth.<<set $watch to 3>>

passages.name: release3
passages.text: This time you don't hesitate.<<timedgoto "hitch3" 2s>>

passages.name: release2
passages.text: Again you hesitate.<<timedgoto "hitch2" 2s>><<set $release to 2>>

passages.name: Start
passages.text: @@color:grey;font-size:2em;[[Taghairm|Briggs]]@@

passages.name: sounds
Untitled Stylesheet 4 1
cycling
bigears
passages.text:
You have blasphemed all holy and unholy things.
Atrocities against my kin have summoned me.
You will have what you wish for 
but you will not have your souls.<<timedgoto "yes" 8s>>

passages.name: master
passages.text: Master.<<timedgoto "ending" 5s>>

passages.name: hub3
passages.text:
<<if $watch is 0>>You and Lauchlan watch the animal suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 1>>Something is watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 2>>Many eyes are watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 3>>Many hosts are watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 4>>Hisses whisper around you and Lauchlan.<<endif>><<if $watch is 5>>Lamentations wail around you and Lauchlan.<<endif>>
A handle's turn would turn the cat.

<<if $crank is 0>>Burning flesh. Smoke. It's nearly dead.<<endif>><<if $crank is 1>>Sizzling fur. Spatters. Pops. It's nearly dead.<<endif>>

Flames roar upward with a rush.

More wood remains to fuel the fire.
There are other sacks ready at hand.<<timedgoto "lauchturn" 4s>>

passages.name: hub2
passages.text:
<<if $watch is 0>>You and Lauchlan watch the animal suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 1>>Something is watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 2>>Many eyes are watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 3>>Many hosts are watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 4>>Hisses whisper around you and Lauchlan.<<endif>><<if $watch is 5>>Lamentations wail around you and Lauchlan.<<endif>>
A handle's <<if $crank is 0>>[[turn]]<<endif>><<if $crank is 1>>turn<<endif>> would turn the cat.

<<if $crank is 0>><<timedreplace 3s >>Burning flesh. <<gains>> Smoke.<<gains>> It's nearly dead.<<endtimedreplace>><<endif>><<if $crank is 1>><<timedreplace 2s >>Sizzling fur. <<gains>>Spatters.<<gains>> Pops.<<gains>> It's nearly dead.<<endtimedreplace>><<endif>>

<<if $fire is 0>>Flames roar upward with a rush.<<endif>><<if $fire is 1>>Flames lick beneath the spit.<<endif>><<if $fire is 2>>Logs crackle as the flames diminish.<<endif>><<if $fire is 3>>The flames in the pit are dwindling.<<endif>><<if $fire gte 4>>Embers smolder in the ash.<<endif>>

More [[wood|wood1]] remains to fuel the fire.
There are other sacks ready at hand.<<if $fire gte 4>><<timedgoto "lauchwood" 5s>><<endif>><<if $fire lte 3>><<timedgoto "lauchturn" 10s>><<endif>><<set $hub to 2>>

passages.name: cords
passages.text: <<set $cords to 1>><<set $fire to $fire +1>>Enough wood to last\nhowever long it needs to [[last|barn]].

passages.name: hub4
passages.text:
<<if $watch is 0>>You and Lauchlan watch the animal suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 1>>Something is watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 2>>Many eyes are watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 3>>Many hosts are watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 4>>Hisses whisper around you and Lauchlan.<<endif>><<if $watch is 5>>Lamentations wail around you and Lauchlan.<<endif>>
A handle's turn would turn the cat.

<<if $crank is 0>>Burning flesh. Smoke. It's nearly dead.<<endif>><<if $crank is 1>>Sizzling fur. Spatters. Pops. It's nearly dead.<<endif>>

Flames roar upward with a rush.

More wood remains to fuel the fire.
There are [[other sacks|cat]] ready at hand.<<timedgoto "nostopping" 4s>>

passages.name: fire
passages.text: Over the fire Lauchlan has built a spit.\nA handle at one end will rotate the skewer.\nOther skewers lie along the [[floor]].

passages.name: lauchskewer
passages.text: He impales the cat and <<if $time lte 4>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 5>>[[roasts|Time1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 6>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 7>>[[roasts|Time2]]<<endif>><<if $time is 8>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 9>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 10>>[[roasts|Time3]]<<endif>><<if $time is 11>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 12>>[[roasts|Time4]]<<endif>><<if $time is 13>>[[roasts|Time5]]<<endif>><<if $time is 14>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 15>>[[roasts|Time6]]<<endif>><<if $time is 16>>[[roasts|Time7]]<<endif>><<if $time is 17>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 18>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 19>>[[roasts|Time8]]<<endif>><<if $time is 20>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 21>>[[roasts|Time9]]<<endif>><<if $time is 22>>[[roasts|Time10]]<<endif>><<if $time is 23>>[[roasts|Time11]]<<endif>><<if $time is 24>>[[roasts|Time12]]<<endif>><<if $time is 25>>[[roasts|Time13]]<<endif>><<if $time is 26>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 27>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 28>>[[roasts|Time14]]<<endif>><<if $time is 29>>[[roasts|Time15]]<<endif>><<if $time is 30>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 31>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 32>>[[roasts|Time16]]<<endif>><<if $time is 33>>[[roasts|Time17]]<<endif>><<if $time is 34>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 35>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 36>>[[roasts|Time18]]<<endif>><<if $time is 37>>[[roasts|Time19]]<<endif>><<if $time is 38>>[[roasts|hub1]]<<endif>><<if $time is 39>>[[roasts|Time20]]<<endif>><<if $time is $death to random(2)>><<if $death is 0>><<playsound "Cat_Death.mp3">><<endif>><<if $death is 1>><<playsound "Cat_Death2.mp3">><<endif>><<if $death is 2>><<playsound "Cat_Death3.mp3">><<endif>>

passages.name: hub1
passages.text:
<<if $watch is 0>>You and Lauchlan watch the animal suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 1>>Something is watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 2>>Many eyes are watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 3>>Many hosts are watching you and Lauchlan suffer.<<endif>><<if $watch is 4>>Hisses whisper around you and Lauchlan.<<endif>><<if $watch is 5>>Lamentations wail around you and Lauchlan.<<endif>>
A handle's <<if $crank is 0>>[[turn]]<<endif>><<if $crank is 1>>turn<<endif>> would turn the cat.

<<if $crank is 0>><<timedreplace 3s >>Burning flesh. <<gains>> Smoke.<<gains>> It's nearly dead.<<endtimedreplace>><<endif>><<if $crank is 1>><<timedreplace 2s >>Sizzling fur. <<gains>>Spatters. <<gains>>Pops.<<gains>> It's nearly dead.<<endtimedreplace>><<endif>>

<<if $fire is 0>>Flames roar upward with a rush.<<endif>><<if $fire is 1>>Flames lick beneath the spit.<<endif>><<if $fire is 2>>Logs crackle as the flames diminish.<<endif>><<if $fire is 3>>The flames in the pit are dwindling.<<endif>><<if $fire gte 4>>Embers smolder in the ash.<<endif>>

More [[wood]] remains to fuel the fire.
There are [[other sacks|cat]] ready at hand.<<if $fire gte 4>><<timedgoto "lauchwood" 5s>><<endif>><<if $fire lte 3>><<timedgoto "nostopping" 10s>><<endif>><<set $hub to 1>>

passages.name: waiting3
passages.text: Outside you cannot see a storm.<<timedgoto "waiting2" 3s>>

passages.name: waiting2
passages.text:
Stars glimmer. Barley ripples.

Before you on the stone wall a great cat 
perches larger than any man. Beneath its 
paws the stones are [[smoldering]].

passages.name: coward
passages.text: Said it weren't right,\nnor any use neither,\ncalled you a coward.<<timedgoto "morning" 5s>>

passages.name: cat
passages.text: <<set $cat to random(80)>>You lift out <<if $cat is 0>>a tomcat<<endif>><<if $cat is 1>>a tabby cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 2>>a feral cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 3>>a tortoiseshell cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 4>>a mewling kitten<<endif>><<if $cat is 5>>a ginger cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 6>>a stunted kitten<<endif>><<if $cat is 7>>a rabid cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 8>>an elderly cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 9>>a pregnant cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 10>>a spotted cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 11>>a striped cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 12>>a three-legged cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 13>>a black cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 14>>a white cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 15>>a wounded cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 16>>a cat with a missing eye<<endif>><<if $cat is 17>>a long-haired cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 18>>a young cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 19>>an angry cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 20>>a fat cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 21>>an emaciated cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 22>>a green-eyed cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 23>>a blue-eyed cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 24>>a yellow-eyed cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 25>>a mangy cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 26>>a trembling cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 27>>a blind kitten<<endif>><<if $cat is 28>>a crippled cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 29>>a flea-infested cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 30>>a hissing cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 31>>a tailless cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 32>>a grey cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 33>>a deaf cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 34>>a starving cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 35>>a purebred cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 36>>a clawing cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 37>>a half-dead cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 38>>a vicious cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 39>>a terrified cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 40>>a housecat<<endif>><<if $cat is 41>>a bloody cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 42>>a battered cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 43>>a little cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 44>>a wild cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 45>>a filthy cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 46>>a scarred cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 47>>an injured cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 48>>a savage cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 49>>a calico cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 50>>a piebald cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 51>>a mitted cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 52>>a harlequin cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 53>>a bicolor cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 54>>an odd-eyed cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 55>>a cat with a bell<<endif>><<if $cat is 56>>a cat with a collar<<endif>><<if $cat is 57>>a sorrel cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 58>>a lilac cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 59>>a battle-torn cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 60>>a meowing cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 61>>a crying cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 62>>a pampered cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 63>>a cat with a broken jaw<<endif>><<if $cat is 64>>an anxious cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 65>>a diseased cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 66>>a brindled cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 67>>a caliby cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 68>>a well fed cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 69>>a lethargic cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 70>>a shaking kitten<<endif>><<if $cat is 71>>a frightened cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 72>>a yowling cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 73>>a wriggling cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 74>>a cream cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 75>>an orange-eyed cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 76>>a cat with a missing ear<<endif>><<if $cat is 77>>a retching cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 78>>a homeless cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 79>>a ferocious cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 80>>a brown cat<<endif>>.<<timedgoto "skewer" 2s>>

passages.name: remain
passages.text: When you leave the barn, the sky is dark.\nIt is an [[early morning]] yet.<<loopsound "Night.mp3">>

passages.name: gone
passages.text: Lauchlan is staring at you, eyes bloodshot.\n\nThe flames in the pit are [[dwindling]].<<fadeoutsound "Fire_Pit.mp3">>

passages.name: Briggs
passages.text:
//Perhaps the most horrible of all 
recorded magical spells.//

Cruelty. Violence. Sounds. 
Headphones recommended.
[[Advance.]]

passages.name: candle
passages.text: He is waiting.<<timedgoto "waiting" 5s>><<fadeoutsound "Caterwaul.mp3">>

passages.name: ready
passages.text: You haven't come \nthis far to back away.<<timedgoto "first sack" 3s>><<set $release to 0>><<set $watch to 0>>

passages.name: Time18
passages.text: Everything is black with soot and smoke.\nThe air is foul with charring fur and bone. \nYou smell the heaps have now begun to [[rot|cat]].

passages.name: floor
passages.text:
As you settle down beside the pit
Lauchlan shuts and bars the barn door.

"You [[ready]] then?" he asks.

passages.name: Time16
passages.text: You catch yourself [[drifting|Time161]] again.

passages.name: Time17
passages.text: You stop your eyelids closing\n[[practically too late|Time171]].

passages.name: Time14
passages.text:
Morning, midday, night.
All hours scorch together.

Your throat is parched.
Your muscles ache.
Lauchlan is [[shivering|hub1]].

passages.name: Untitled Passage 2 1 1
Time12
passages.text: It will not stop speaking.\nIts litany [[burns|hub2]].

passages.name: Time13
passages.text: Whatever it is [[stops|hub1]] speaking.<<fadeoutsound "Hiss.mp3">>

passages.name: nospace
Time11
passages.text:
"You hear that?" Lauchlan says. "God, you //hear// that?"

Anathemas. Abominations. Murderers.

You [[hear it|hub1]].<<loopsound "Hiss.mp3">>

passages.name: that way
passages.text:
You've got nothing to carry.

When you leave the barley fields
you see the [[barn|fence]].

passages.name: early morning
passages.text: The other cats you [[loose]] into the highlands.\nAn unfinished taghairm cannot be repeated.

passages.name: About
passages.text:
[[Taghairm|ending]] is copyright 2015 by Chandler Groover. 
It may be distributed for free, but not sold or included in any 
for-profit collection without written permission from the author. 
It was made for the 2015 Interactive Fiction Competition.

Many thanks to PhoenixNine for testing and suggestions!

The game's cover image is modified from //A Sympsychograph 
of a Cat// (1896).

passages.name: Sacks
passages.text:
<<set $sacks to 1>><<set $fire to $fire +1>>You can see them moving in the firelight
although they've long since stopped crying.

It took [[months|barn]] to gather them all.

passages.name: Time251
passages.text: Lamentation.<<timedgoto "cat" 3s>>

passages.name: doit
passages.text: You impale the cat and [[roast]] it\non the spit over the flames.<<set $crank to 0>><<set $hub to 0>><<set $time to $time +1>><<playsound "Cat_Death.mp3">>

passages.name: Time173
passages.text: "I'll stay sharp," Lauchlan says.\n"Don't come near me."<<timedgoto "hub1" 4s>>

passages.name: nothing
passages.text: There's nothing [[left]] to say.

passages.name: you can
passages.text:
Homeward you pause below a hill
where headstones populate the ground.

You wonder whether they are [[cold]] 
resting beneath those stones.

passages.name: lauchturn
passages.text: <<set $cat to random(80)>>Lauchlan takes a sack\nand lifts out <<if $cat is 0>>a tomcat<<endif>><<if $cat is 1>>a tabby cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 2>>a feral cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 3>>a tortoiseshell cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 4>>a mewling kitten<<endif>><<if $cat is 5>>a ginger cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 6>>a stunted kitten<<endif>><<if $cat is 7>>a rabid cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 8>>an elderly cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 9>>a pregnant cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 10>>a spotted cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 11>>a striped cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 12>>a three-legged cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 13>>a blue-eyed cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 24>>a yellow-eyed cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 25>>a mangy cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 26>>a trembling cat<<endif>><<if $cat is 27>>a blind kitten<<endif>><<if $cat is passages.name: Time26
passages.text:
Everywhere you look you see black cats
with fangs open. There are not hundreds. 
There are thousands.

Your fire is a [[circle|cat]] against the darkness.

passages.name: timed goto
Time19
passages.text: Another shadow slinks along the wall.\nMore eyes [[watching|hub1]].<<set $watch to 2>>

passages.name: gone2
passages.text: Now what awaits in the future will await, \nand what remains in the past will [[remain]].

passages.name: gone1
passages.text: Shadows disperse into the dark\nand now the dark is only [[emptiness|gone]].

passages.name: left
passages.text:
It's still dark when you cross the fields
to your cousin's land. Barley and stars.

The walk's not short.
Nobody travels out [[that way]].
